resources:
F5N
" Use GUI Mode Use Terminal Mode Load Previous Pipeline
Enter server address Request Job Process Job Request Another Job Go to start screen
This will run all the 5 pipeline steps on Ecoli dataset(10MB)\n\nYou can find all the files downloaded, created and the logcat in the mobile-genomics folder in your main storage
F5N is a Mobile application for Reference Guided Sequence Alignment using Oxford Nanopore Technology Data.\n\nPlease read the following terms before you use this application.\n\n - This app needs storage permission inorder to read/write files generated from the pipeline steps\n - Grant System Settings Write permission to dim the display to save power when running a pipeline. Check help for more information\n - This app needs at least 2GB free RAM to smoothly function\n - If you have less memory available, minimizing the app while running some process, may stop the process and generate incomplete results
SD_CARD_TREE_URI STEP_LIST FOLDER_PATH APP_MODE WRAPPER_OBJ RESULTS_SUMMARY SCREEN_BRIGHTNESS DIM_SCREEN PREV_CONN_LOG COMPRESSED_FILE SERVER_IP
Choose files
Settings Settings Default Storage Path\nDefault download and file extraction location\n key_storage_preference key_reference_gnome
Reference Genome Storage Path\nX.fa and X.idx files should be stored in this directory to automatically generate pipeline commands in CONNECT TO MINIT mode\n key_time_preference Time interval between jobs\nSet the time interval to wait between consecutive jobs on MinIt Burst mode\n
key_pipeline_type_preference key_pipeline_type_temp_preference
About key_version_preference F5N is a Mobile application for Reference Guided Sequence Alignment and Analysis using Nanopore Data. You can find out more from https://github.com/SanojPunchihewa/f5n Version key_feedback_preference Send Feedback Got any queries? We are happy to help! FAQ View frequently asked questions https://github.com/SanojPunchihewa/f5n/blob/master/README.md Terms & Conditions https://github.com/SanojPunchihewa/f5n/blob/master/README.md key_storage_permission key_sdcard_storage_permission key_write_settings_permission key_pipeline_type Reduce Brightness during Pipeline Execution Download / Extract to SD Card Choose SD Card from here Storage Permission key_min_it_upload_files Select files to upload Select output files key_log_file_preference Log file directory\nLocation to save f5n.log and f5n.tmp files\n Select files that should be uploaded to F5N Server(default output file names are used) Automated Manual (Try manual mode for better support, when on low memory) Burst
